title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 105.5 - Resumption of active status
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 105.5 - Resumption of active status

State Regulations

Within 30 days of receiving written notification of intent
to resume business and the registration certificate stamped inactive, the
superintendent shall issue a new registration certificate authorizing the
resumption of the mortgage brokerage business, which action shall be published
in the Banking Department's weekly bulletin. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
105.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
